content.en: Frequency estimation: Researchers have developed algorithms that can accurately estimate the frequency response of a process from a single relay feedback test. These algorithms use techniques such as the Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) to identify multiple points on the frequency response. The algorithms can also be used to obtain models of the step response and assess the performance of control systems.
content.da: Frekvensestimation: Forskere har udviklet algoritmer, der præcist kan estimere et process' frekvensrespons ud fra en enkelt relæ-feedback-test. Disse algoritmer anvender teknikker som Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) til at identificere flere punkter på frekvensresponsen. Algoritmerne kan også bruges til at opnå modeller af step-responsen og vurdere ydeevnen af kontrolsystemer.
